name: Lamarkius
description:
Description

An arcadey infinite scrolling shooter where your guns evolve as you use them. Your left and right gun each have a different mutation. Charge your gun to keep one of the mutations, at which point that mutation will be applied to both guns, and a new mutation will be applied to each.

Enemies have randomly mutated weapons.

Standard Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move

Z - Fire Left

X - Fire Right

M - Mute

Esc - Return to menu
